item.title: 活动家的家人说，克里姆林宫曾勒索阿列克谢-纳瓦尔尼的母亲秘密埋葬他，并试图阻止支持者举行公开葬礼
item.description:
The Kremlin had blackmailed Alexei Navalny’s mother into burying him in secret, and had tried to prevent supporters from holding a public funeral, the activist’s family said https://t.co/rhwpbIHtV9 pic.twitter.com/rxHxNnFsdN

— Financial Times (@FT) February 28, 2024

item.title: 2024 年本应是企业税收竞相逐低的终结之年，但一项备受瞩目的跨国公司征税全球协议的实施似乎受到了威胁。以下为 @ft 提供的《颠覆时代
item.description:
2024 was meant to be the year that the race to the bottom in corporate taxation ended, but the implementation of a much-heralded global deal on how multinationals are taxed appears to be under threat. Here's Disrupted Times https://t.co/tiSzo2mHk0 via @ft

— darrendodd (@darrendodd) February 28, 2024

item.title: 保守党之所以难以解决内部令人震惊的观点，原因之一是该党不再清楚自己的信仰、目标和边界在哪里。 不对保守党偏执的边界进行监管的代价
item.description:
One reason the Conservatives are struggling to tackle shocking views within is that the party is no longer sure exactly what it believes, what it wants to be & where its boundaries lie.

The price of not policing the Tories' paranoid frontier https://t.co/02qziD5qLE

— robert shrimsley (@robertshrimsley) February 28, 2024

item.title: 新消息：政府正准备任命下一任英国驻美国大使蒂姆-巴罗（Tim Barrow）、英国驻联合国大使芭芭拉-伍德沃德（Barbara Woodward）、马修-里克罗夫特（Matthew Rycroft）（内政部）和菲利普-巴顿（Philip Barton）（外交和联邦事务部）等人。
item.description:
NEW: Govt is preparing to appoint next UK ambassador to US

NSA Tim Barrow, UK ambo to UN Barbara Woodward, perm secs Matthew Rycroft (Home Office) & Philip Barton (FCDO) are among the names being considered

More from me, @georgewparker & @pickardje 👇https://t.co/fUA0AnpPBC

— Lucy Fisher (@LOS_Fisher) February 28, 2024

item.title: 共和党人的命运表明，等待对强硬派、江湖骗子、偏执狂和规则破坏者采取坚定立场的代价 via @ft
